name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Enjoy high-quality sound and a comfortable fit with our wireless Bluetooth headphones. Features a built-in microphone, easy-to-use control buttons, and a long-lasting battery.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Stay hydrated with our durable and eco-friendly stainless steel water bottle. Designed with double-wall insulation to keep your drinks cold for up to 24 hours.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: Upgrade your wardrobe with our stylish and comfortable slim fit jeans. Made from high-quality denim with added stretch for flexibility and movement.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Find your balance with our non-slip yoga mat, perfect for all types of workouts. Made from eco-friendly materials, it's lightweight and easy to carry.

name: Instant Pot 6-Quart
description: Save time and effort with our versatile Instant Pot, featuring 7 cooking functions in one appliance. Ideal for pressure cooking, slow cooking, rice cooking, and more.
